Plot: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.
Title: Smokey and the Bandit
Actors: Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jerry Reed, Mike Henry
Writer: Hal Needham (story), Robert L. Levy (story), James Lee Barrett (screenplay), Charles Shyer (screenplay), Alan Mandel (screenplay)
